availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mason Duncan Ellis (Harrison County, KY, carpenter)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Ann Glenn Ellis in Harrison County, Kentucky, on January 4, 1855. Father of Elizabeth Ellis. Carpenter in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 690.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film 000216896, p. 75.
"Mason Duncan Ellis (1833-1924)," Find A Grave, Memorial 17012309, accessed January 27, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/17012309.
